name: Dark Image Background
description: A dark image background. I liked the dark image background on Firefox when viewing images like jpg, gif, & png directly, so I created a style for it to use in Chrome and other browsers. Anytime you view images directly in the web browser, where you see it ending in the image extension like http://i.imgur.com/6sJvBjx.jpg , a file from your computer, or whatever, you'll have a dark background instead of a blinding white one.
additional_info: Version 1 - Initial Release Version 1.1 - Added .webp extension. I had to add some URL because it wouldn't let me save it anymore with just wildcards, so that's why google.com is in there. If you notice any other image extensions that need to be added, let me know. Feel free to make a donation if you appreciate my styles.
